    Builder of DefaultFeatureManager.
    Author:
    Christian Kaltepoth

      • autoDiscovery

        public FeatureManagerBuilder autoDiscovery(Object context)
        The method will use the BeanFinder SPI to find a TogglzConfig instance to use for configuration. The method will throw a runtime exception if no or more than one TogglzConfig implementation is found.
        Parameters:
        context - An optional context object which is provided to the BeanFinder implementations. This parameter is typically only used in web application to supply the ServletContext.

      • togglzConfig

        public FeatureManagerBuilder togglzConfig(TogglzConfig config)
        Initialize the builder with the configuration from the supplied TogglzConfig instance.

      • build

        public FeatureManager build()
        Create the FeatureManager using the current configuration of the builder
